Label: plant growth cycle
Text definition: A {whole plant development stage} that begins with {seed germination} or {exit from dormancy} and ends with death or {entry into dormancy}.
Formal definition:
(
    ('whole plant development stage' THAT 'starts with' SOME 'seed germination') OR
    ('whole plant development stage' THAT 'starts with' SOME 'exit from dormancy')
) AND (
    ('whole plant development stage' THAT 'precedes' SOME 'entry into dormancy') OR
    ('whole plant development stage' THAT 'precedes' SOME 'death stage')
)

Label: initial growth cycle
Text definition: A {plant growth cycle} that begins with {seed germination}.
Formal definition: 'plant growth cycle' THAT 'starts with' SOME 'seed germination'

Label: later growth cycle
Text definition: A {plant growth cycle} that begins with {exit from dormancy}.
Formal definition: 'plant growth cycle' THAT 'starts with' SOME 'exit from dormancy'

Label: true leaf
Text definition: A {vascular leaf} that is not a {cotyledon}.
Notes: This is provisional and should eventually be defined in the PO, not the PPO.

Label: plant regreening process
Notes: Need to request this in GO.
